i like dogs
i love coffee
i hate milk
i enjoy tea
you like cats
you hate coffee
you want snowing
he expects promotion
he wants money
he waits snowing
she enjoys reading
they play soccer
we are students
my dog is cute
her cat likes fish
he writes novels
we love music
she hates traffic
they need help
the sun is shining
birds are flying
i like programming
he studies mathematics
you watch movies
we enjoy swimming
he likes pizza
she plays tennis
they eat apples
i am learning 
we love hiking
the car is fast 
he drives carefully
she enjoys painting 
they are working
i like to sing
he reads books
she watches TV
they visit museums
we cook dinner 
he builds robots
she loves chocolate
i am writing
you are dancing
he enjoys sports
they are winning
she studies science
he loves coffee
they play basketball
we run marathons
she teaches art
